title: George's Marvellous Medicine
description: A taste of her own medicine.George is alone in the house with Grandma. The most horrid, grizzly old grunion of a grandma ever. She needs something stronger than her usual medicine to cure her grouchiness. A special grandma medicine, a remedy for everything . And George knows just what to put into it. Grandma's in for the surprise of her lifeâ€”and so is George, when he sees the results of his mixture!
author: Roald Dahl
